vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.25.2;
son of: Abraham (H0085) and Keturah (H6989);
brother of: Zimran (H2175), Jokshan (H3370), Medan (H4091), Midian (H4080) and Shuah (H7744);
half-brother of: Ishmael (H3458) and Isaac (H3327)
§ Ishbak = "he releases"
a son of Abraham by Keturah and progenitor of an Arabian tribe
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
伊施巴 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "他釋放"
亞伯拉罕和基土拉所生的兒子, 一個阿拉伯部落的始祖
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
伊施巴 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "他释放"
亚伯拉罕和基土拉所生的儿子, 一个阿拉伯部落的始祖
